headline: Assessing Walmart’s (WMT) Valuation After Earnings Beat Buyback Plan Dividend Hike And Tech Investments
summary: Walmart (WMT) just paired a fresh earnings beat with a higher dividend, a new US$30b share repurchase plan, and ongoing bets on e-commerce, advertising, and automation, giving investors several moving pieces to assess at once. See our latest analysis for Walmart. At a share price of US$125.81, Walmart has paired a 17.6% 3 month share price return with a 35.6% 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has been building around its earnings beat, dividend lift, and fresh US$30b...
